import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb } from "@gull"; import ReactPaginate from "react-paginate"; import { data } from './data' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class CandidatesOverview extends Component { state = { rowsPerPage: 10, page: 0 } render() { let { rowsPerPage, page } = this.state return (
Candidates Overview
{data .slice(rowsPerPage * page, rowsPerPage * (page + 1)) .map((item, index) => ( ) )}
Role Title Total Candidates Based In Experience Workplace Type Created Date Role Status Actions
{item.RoleTitle} {item.TotalCandidates} {item.BasedIn} {item.Experience} {item.WorkplaceType} {item.CreatedDate} {item.RoleStatus}
); } } export default CandidatesOverview;
